object.add_where: and (exists(select * from et_staff where t.id_staff = et_staff.id_staff and et_staff.id_user=$ID_User ) or exists(select * from mba_user_group join mba_group on mba_user_group.id_group=mba_group.id_group where mba_user_group.id_user=$ID_User and (mba_group.code='boss' or mba_group.code='admin' or mba_group.code='adm')))

and (exists(select * from et_staff where t.id_staff = et_staff.id_staff and et_staff.id_user=$ID_User ) or exists(select * from mba_user_group join mba_group on mba_user_group.id_group=mba_group.id_group where mba_user_group.id_user=$ID_User and (mba_group.code='boss' or mba_group.code='admin' or mba_group.code='adm')))

and (exists(select * from et_staff where t.id_staff = et_staff.id_staff and et_staff.id_user=$ID_User ) or exists(select * from mba_user_group join mba_group on mba_user_group.id_group=mba_group.id_group where mba_user_group.id_user=$ID_User and (mba_group.code='boss' or mba_group.code='admin' or mba_group.code='adm')))

and (exists(select * from et_staff where t.id_staff = et_staff.id_staff and et_staff.id_user=$ID_User ) or exists(select * from mba_user_group join mba_group on mba_user_group.id_group=mba_group.id_group where mba_user_group.id_user=$ID_User and (mba_group.code='boss' or mba_group.code='admin' or mba_group.code='adm')))

field.full_name: Сотрудник, на чье имя адресовано письмо или сотрудник который подписал письмо в зависмости от направления
ИД письма, на которое текущее письмо является ответом
Для исходящих писем - это дата создания письма (или регистрации, или отправки), для входящих - дата получения.
